author: Carolyn Stilwell
description: Lemon-herb chicken is a quick and easy main course, made in under 30 minutes with minimal ingredients that you're always likely to have on hand.
ingredients: 2 (5 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
instructions:
Place chicken in a bowl; pour 1/2 of the lemon juice over top and season with salt.
Heat oil in a small skillet over medium-low heat. Add chicken to the hot oil, along with the remaining lemon juice and oregano. Season with pepper. Sauté until golden brown and the juices run clear, 5 to 10 minutes per side.
Serve with parsley for garnish.
instructions_list: Place chicken in a bowl; pour 1/2 of the lemon juice over top and season with salt.

Heat oil in a small skillet over medium-low heat. Add chicken to the hot oil, along with the remaining lemon juice and oregano. Season with pepper. Sauté until golden brown and the juices run clear, 5 to 10 minutes per side.
title: Simple Lemon-Herb Chicken
